sections.title: GestionaleAuto.com - React Developer
sections.technologies: React, Javascript, Redux, Redux-Form, Redux-Saga, Html & Css.
sections.achieving: Learned to working in Agile Scrum team: my daily tasks ranged from refactoring to develop new feature for a large project code base of a management software. In which I managed to improve the simplicity and performance of some components, making them 30-40% faster.
sections.description: Worked with Javascript, React, Redux, Redux-Form, Redux-Saga in the development, maintenance and refactoring of a management software.

sections.title: Discontinuity - Full Stack Developer
sections.technologies: React Native, React, Javascript, Gatsby, AWS, DynamoDB, GraphQL, Html & Css.
sections.achieving: Working in Agile team, with maintaining and implementing applications and web sites from scratch
sections.description: Worked principally with React-Native, ReactJS, GraphQL, Apollo and AWS in a social app and websites.

sections.title: University of Padua - Computer Science
sections.description: With optional course in Multimedia & Mobile Programming. (I miss the last 3 exams and I should get my degree in September)

sections.title: Accountant
sections.description: Accountant institute Carlo Rosselli, Castelfranco Veneto (Italy).

sections.title: Programming
sections.description: I love programming, thinking and using my mind to create more and more clean and especially performed code. I like working with innovative technologies, mainly with web and mobile application. Currently I use a lot React and React-Native.

sections.title: Vegetable garden
sections.description: These passion allow me to get my hands dirty, free my mind and appreciate how much nature can give us.

sections.title: {Codemotion} Rome & {Codemotion} Milan
sections.description: (Participated) Codemotion is the biggest tech conference in Italy and one of the most important in Europe. Here I had the chance to meet new people who shared my passions and follow front-end and react talks which allowed me to improve the quality of my code and learn new things.

sections.title: Hackathon won
sections.description: First prize winning with a web application developed with the use of the React library and the Google Maps API.

sections.title: University project - Social web app (React + NodeJs)
sections.description: This project gave me the opportunity to collaborate with 6 other unknown people, including a freelancer who gave me a solid foundation of React.

sections.title: University project - Mobile app (React Native)
sections.description: Here on my voluntary request for the Mobile Programming and Multimedia course, I decided to create an application with React Native, to discover the mobile world with React and learning the basics of React Native.

sections.title: DevFest Veneto - GDG Venice
sections.description: I partecipated to the DevFest organized by Google Developers Group Venice.

more.title: Coding Gym - Programmers in Padua
more.description: I partecipated to some "4-5" Coding Gym. Coding Gym is an international format of programming laboratories open to any language and developed for continuous improvement.

more.title: Talks - Programmers in Padua
more.description: I partecipated to some talks. Programmers in Padua is a little community, who work and passionate about programming, new technologies and startups. We meet once a month in an open and informal environment, where the participants propose themselves for the talks.
